settings.name: Start of the season to retain (UTC)
settings.description: Select the starting date and time (year will be ignored)

settings.name: End of the season to retain (UTC)
settings.description: Select the ending date and time (year will be ignored)

settings.name: Years to select seasons from
settings.description: To select the season from a specific year or years in the dataset, enter a comma-separated list. If left empty, all years will be incuded. If the season crosses December-January, include the starting year.

settings.name: Name of the season
settings.description: Provide a name for the season. This will be attributed to all records during the season in a new column 'season'. If left empty, the specified time interval will be used. If 'Filter data for season locations?' is not checked, records that are not in the selected season will be assigned the value 'none'.

settings.name: Filter data for the season?
settings.description: Select whether to filter the data set to retain only records in the specified season and years. If not selected, the complete input data set will be returned with the results identified in the new column 'season'.

settings.name: Split tracks by season?
settings.description: If 'Filter data for the season?' is selected, select whether to split the tracks by season. This prevents unrealistic steps connecting the end of one season with the start of the next, which can lead to unexpected results in subsequent analyses. Note that this setting is only possible if the above Filter setting is TRUE.
